title: Latest patch is stuck at 33%?
body:
Hey guys,

I'm having a really annoying issue where my patcher is stuck at 33% and just "calculating differences" endlessly.  My little brother patched his and said it was small and quick but that doesn't seem to be the case.  I've gotten up to 20,000 files scanned. I have never seen that before and it has never taken this long before (being stuck at 33%) even for massive patches.  Is this happening to anyone else?  If so, how do I fix it?

Cheers, 

Messenger

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sorry for the late reply.

Is it still stuck? did you allow it to run to completion?

If you're still experiencing this issue, could you please download the [Hextech Toolkit](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/player-support/tools/HTK_Setup.msi) and force a repatch from there.
